name: Sacred Boomerang
description:
The World is being attacked by evil Demons, the only one who can save him is the native HAO with his sacred boomerang

Use WASD to move
Use mouse to AIM
Use Mouse Left and Right Click to attack

Can you defeat the Demon Boss?
all sprites,music and sounds were made by  Ye_Arts  during the JAM 
All programming was made by Vithor14 during the jam
